wishlist.title: Climbing Chalk Bag

products.title: Camping Tent 2-Person
products.description: Compact and lightweight 2-person tent built for easy setup. Features waterproof fabric, double doors, and excellent ventilation — perfect for weekend camping trips.

products.description: Spacious 6-person family tent with strong poles and weatherproof fabric. Includes a large vestibule for gear storage and multiple ventilation windows for airflow.

products.description: A lightweight and compact sleeping bag for 3-season camping. Features synthetic insulation, a soft inner lining, and a compression sack for easy packing.

products.title: Mountain Biking Helmet
products.description: Lightweight MTB helmet with MIPS protection system. Ensures superior impact absorption, adjustable fit, and excellent ventilation for trail riding safety.

products.title: Fishing Rod

products.title: Outdoor Backpack 40L
products.description: Spacious 40L hiking backpack with multiple compartments. Features breathable back padding, adjustable straps, and a rain cover for all-weather treks.
